Verses: 1 kengireyaa Oor Sabaikku Oozhiyakkaariyaagiya Nammudaiya Sagodhari Pebeyaalai Neengal Karththarukkulparisuththavaangalukketrapadi Etrukkondu,

2 endhak Kaariyaththil Ungal Udhavi Avalukkuth Thevaiyaayirukkiradho Adhile Neengal Avalukku Udhaviseyyavendumendru Avalai Ungalidaththil Oppuvikkiren; Aval Anegarukkum Enakkunkooda Aadharavaayirundhaval.
3 kiristhu Yesuvukkul En Udanvelaiyaatkalaagiya Piriskillaalaiyum Aakkillaavaiyum Vaazhththungal.
4 avargal En Piraananukkaagath Thangal Kazhuththaik Koduththavargal; Avargalaippatri Naanmaaththiramalla, Purajaadhiyaaril Undaana Sabaiyaarellaarum Nandriyaridhalullavargalaayirukkiraargal.
5 avargaludaiya Veettile Koodivarugira Sabaiyaiyum Vaazhththungal. Agaayaavile Kiristhuvukku Mudharbalanaagiya En Piriyamaana Eppaneththai Vaazhththungal.
6 engalukkaaga Migavum Pirayaasappatta Mariyaalai Vaazhththungal.
7 apposthalarukkul Peyar Petravargalum Enakku Mundhik Kiristhuvukkullaanavargalum En Inaththaarum Ennudanekoodak Kaavalil Kattundavargalumaayirukkira Androneekkaiyum Yooniyaavaiyum Vaazhththungal.
8 karththarukkul Enakkup Piriyamaana Ambiliyaavai Vaazhththungal.
9 kiristhuvukkul Nammode Udanvelaiyaalaagiya Urbaanaiyum, En Piriyamaana Sthaakkiyaiyum Vaazhththungal.
10 kiristhuvukkul Uththamanaagiya Appelleyai Vaazhththungal. Aristhopooluvin Veettaarai Vaazhththungal.
11 en Inaththaanaagiya Erodhiyonai Vaazhththungal. Narkeesuvin Veettaaril Karththarukkutpattavargalai Vaazhththungal.
12 karththarukkul Pirayaasappadugira Thiripenaalaiyum Thirposaalaiyum Vaazhththungal. Karththarukkulmigavum Pirayaasappatta Piriyamaana Persiyaalai Vaazhththungal.
13 karththarukkul Therindhukollappatta Roobaiyum, Enakkum Thaayaagiya Avanudaiya Thaayaiyum Vaazhththungal.
14 asingireeththuvaiyum, Pilekonaiyum, Ermaavaiyum, Paththiropaavaiyum, Ermeyaiyum, Avargalodirukkira Sagodhararaiyum Vaazhththungal.
15 pilologaiyum, Yooliyaalaiyum, Nereyaiyum, Avanudaiya Sagodhariyaiyum, Olimbaavaiyum, Avargalodirukkira Parisuththavaangalellaaraiyum Vaazhththungal.
16 oruvaraiyoruvar Parisuththa Muththaththodu Vaazhththungal. Kiristhuvin Sabaiyaar Ungalai Vaazhththugiraargal.

17 andriyum Sagodharare, Neengal Katrukkonda Ubadhesaththirku Virodhamaaip Pirivinaiyum Idaralgalaiyum Undaakkugiravargalaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu, Avargalai Vittu Vilagavendumendru Ungalukkup Buththisollugiren.

18 appadippattavargal Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvukku Oozhiyanjseyyaamal Thangal Vayitrukke Oozhiyanjseydhu, Nayavasanippinaalum Ichchagappechchinaalum, Kapadillaadhavargaludaiya Irudhayangalai Vanjikkiravargalaayirukkiraargal.

19 ungal Keezhppadidhal Yaavarukkum Theriyavandhirukkiradhu. Aagaiyaal Ungalaikkuriththuch Sandhoshappadugiren; Aanaalum Neengal Nanmaikku Gnaanigalum Theemaikkup Pedhaigalumaayirukkavendumendru Virumbugiren.
20 samaadhaanaththin Dhevan Seekkiramaaich Saaththaanai Ungal Kaalgalin Keezhe Nasukkippoduvaar. Nammudaiyakarththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Kirubai Ungaludanekooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
21 en Udanvelaiyaalaagiya Theemoththeyum, En Inaththaaraagiya Loogiyum, Yaasonum, Sosipaththarum Ungalai Vaazhththugiraargal.
22 indha Nirubaththai Ezhudhina Therthiyuvaagiya Naan Karththarukkul Ungalai Vaazhththugiren.
23 ennaiyum Sabaiyanaiththaiyum Ubasariththuvarugira Kaayu Ungalai Vaazhththugiraan. Pattanaththu Ukkiraanakkaaranaagiya Erasthum, Sagodharanaagiya Kuvarththum Ungalai Vaazhththugiraargal.
24 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Kirubai Ungal Anaivarodunkooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.

25 aadhikaalamudhal Adakkamaayirundhu, Ippozhudhu Theerkkadharisana Aagamangalinaale Anaadhi Dhevanudaiya Kattalaiyinpadi Veliyarangamaakkappattadhum, Sagalajaadhigalum Visuvaasaththirkuk Keezhppadiyumpadikku Avargalukku Arivikkappattadhumaayirukkira Ragasiyaththai Velippaduththugiradhaana,
26 yesukiristhuvaippatriya Pirasangamaagiya En Suviseshaththinpadiye Ungalai Sthirappaduththa Vallavarum,
27 thaam Oruvare Gnaanamullavarumaayirukkira Dhevanukku Yesukiristhuvin Moolamaai Endrendraikkum Magimaiyundaavadhaaga. Aamen.
